statements: SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE password = 'securepassword';
SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT username, phone_number, email FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE is_verified = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM users WHERE multi_factor_authentication = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM user_logs ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'jane_smith@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT user_id, email, multi_factor_authentication FROM users WHERE multi_factor_authentication = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_logs WHERE logout_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 'a3f40714-05b6-4c8b-bcad-7b4b301bf57e';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM sessions WHERE logout_time IS NULL;
SELECT method_type, is_verified From mfa_methods WHERE user_id = 'b2bea1a0-7bbd-4791-a0c3-0d5deeaf13b7' ORDER BY method_type;
SELECT * FROM sessions JOIN users ON sessions.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY sessions.login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, mfa_enabled FROM users WHERE mfa_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT method_type, method_data FROM mfa_methods WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY login_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE mfa_enabled = true ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, mfa_logs.action FROM users JOIN mfa_logs ON users.user_id = mfa_logs.user_id WHERE mfa_logs.action = 'login' ORDER BY mfa_logs.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT mfa_logs.timestamp, mfa_methods.method_type FROM mfa_logs JOIN mfa_methods ON mfa_logs.method_id = mfa_methods.method_id WHERE mfa_methods.method_type = 'OTP' AND mfa_logs.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY mfa_logs.timestamp ASC;

SELECT users.username, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM users JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id WHERE user_sessions.logout_time IS NOT NULL GROUP BY users.username HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY login_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, access_token FROM access_tokens WHERE expires_at > NOW();
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, device_id, timestamp FROM authentication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT devices.device_name, authenticators.authenticator_type FROM devices INNER JOIN authenticators ON devices.user_id = authenticators.user_id;
SELECT users.username, access_tokens.access_token FROM users INNER JOIN access_tokens ON users.user_id = access_tokens.user_id WHERE access_tokens.expires_at > NOW();
